chinese: 我喜欢朴素的T裇，因为他们简单又便宜
english: i like plain T-shirts as they are simple and cheap

chinese: 戴着这顶比萨帽子，你看上去滑稽极了
english: you look ridiculous wearing this pizza hat

chinese: 我们用这个机器将大石从地面吊起
english: we use the machine to hoist the huge stone off the ground

chinese: 这个罪犯被剥夺了政治权利
english: the criminal suffered the deprivation of political rights

chinese: 这枚奖牌是对我运动技能的认可
english: i received this medal in recognition of my sports skills

chinese: 英文单词teacher一词源自于词根teach
english: the English word teacher derives from the root word teach
a fortnight is made up of fourteen days

chinese: 这座水塔为当地的家庭供水
english: the water tower is supplying water for local families

chinese: 消防队员成功地扑灭了大火
english: the firefighters successfully tackled the blaze

chinese: 你可以用扩音器来扩大音量
english: you can amplify your voice with a megaphone

chinese: 灯塔坐落在岩石海岸上
english: the lighthouse sits on a very rocky shore

chinese: 大熊猫是中国土生土长的动物
english: the giant panda is an animal which is indigenous to China
